p: Ursolic acid, present in apple pomace, is associated with antimicrobial effects against methicillin-resistant S. aureus, vancomycin-resistant Enterococci, Streptococcus sp., Actinomyces sp., and Listeria monocytogenes [ 39, 154, 155]. Synergistic effects of ursolic and oleanoic acid against Mycobacterium tuberculosis have been postulated [ 156].
